definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Is 28:22 band, bond, poet. & late (= [[מׂאסֵר]]; Eth. m40sar: Syr. me0sarto0, cf. As. mêsiru, sheathing, plating, e.g. Lyon:Sargontexte, p. 16, l. 65 & p. 80)—cstr. [[מוֹסַר]] Job 12:18 (so Di Hoffm al. for [[מוּסַר]]); pl. [[מוֹסֵרוֹת]] Je 5:5, Je 27:2; cstr. [[מׂסְרוֹת]] Job 39:5; [[מוֹסְרֵי]] Is 52:2; sf. [[מוֹסֵרָי֑]] Ps 116:16; [[מוֹסְרוֹתֶיךָ]] Je 30:8; [[מוֹסְרֵיכֶם]] Is 28:22; [[מוֹסְרוֹתֵי֑מוֹ]] Ps 2:3 etc.;—bands acc. after [[פִתֵּהַ]] Job 39:5 restraining-bands of wild ass; Ps 116:16 bonds of distress; Is 52:2 [[חַוׇּארֵח]] ´[[מ]] bonds of captivity of Zion, vb. Hithp.; cf. also Job 12:18 [[מוֹסַר מְלָכִים פִּתֵּחַ]] (so rd., v. supr. & AV RV); Di understands bonds imposed by kings; Hoffm girdles of kings, & rds. [[וַיׇּסַר]] in ‖, for [[וַיֶּאְסַר]]; more oft. acc. after [[נִתֵּק]] Ps 2:3 bonds imposed by ´[[י]] & his anointed, cf. Je 5:5 & Je 2:20 (LXX Vulgate, v. Comm.); of Yahweh's breaking bonds of Isr. Je 30:8, Na 1:13 (last four ‖[[שָׁבַר עׂל]]), bonds of oppressed Ps 107:14; ´[[יֶחְזְקוּ מ]] Is 28:22, i.e. bonds imposed by Assyria; cf. Je 27:2 (‖[[מׂט]]) lit., symbol. of rule of Nebuchadrezzar.
